</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> If unit is diving and doesn't have a re-breather, it returns [[false]]. Diving means the unit's head is underwater. If unit is underwater and has a re-breather, the command returns [[true]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isAbleToBreathe''' unit </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_canBreath = [[isAbleToBreathe]] [[player]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>[[underwater]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
